#summary This page contains basic information about setting up Cachechu on a server.
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

== Introduction ==
  Cachechu is a simple G2 GWebCache written in PHP.

== File List ==
 * *index.php*                - Cachechu PHP code
 * *main.php*                 - Web interface
 * *main.css*                 - main stylesheet
 * *robots.txt*               - blocks CoralWebPrx
 * *data/urls.dat.sample*     - default list of URLs (remove .sample to use)
 * *data/stats.dat.sample*    - empty stats file (remove .sample to use)
 * *data/start.dat.sample*    - empty start file (remove .sample to use)
 * *config/config.ini.sample* - default config file (remove .sample to use)
 * *readme.txt*               - setup information

== Requirements ==
  # The following paths require write (and read) access:
    * data/bans.dat
    * data/hosts.dat
    * data/urls.dat
    * data/stats.dat
    * data/start.dat
  # The following file should be set as the directory index:
    * index.php
  # To enable stat logging, the following files should exist:
    * data/stats.dat
    * data/start.dat
  # If your host cannot test clients on a port other than 80, set `[`Host`]` Testing in config.ini to 0.

==Web interface==
  # 'Test Cache' outputs a 'get' and 'ping' GWebCache request.
  # 'Update' performs a URL 'update' GWebCache request with the URL entered.

==Compatibility==
  Cachechu has been tested under PHP 5.2.9.
